databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.SEND_FLAG , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.VESSEL_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.DATA_NO , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.USER_KEY , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.RENEW_DATE , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.TS FROM MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER
